name: Unmask The Rat
description: Join the heist family as they attempt their last three jobs before retiring from their life of crime. Get assigned a role and help your new family Break In, Steal the Loot, and Get Away.  Don't be to trusting, Big Boss thinks there is a Rat in this new family. If the Rat sabotages the Heist too much you wont have enough money to retire and the whole family will get caught. Work with your friends to find the Rat or try to blend in and take this crime family down from the inside. Local multi player hidden information game  for 6 - 8 players played on one phone.  Available on iOS.
